entry.title: Batch exchange withdrawal to lightning requires covenants
entry.summary: The email discusses the risk associated with batched splicing in splice implementations. It suggests that if a splice implementation decides to splice again when a prior splice isn't confirming, it can lead to potential risks. However, the email also mentions that once any subsequent splice is confirmed, the issue will self-resolve. The author signs off with a farewell message.
